descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Delete Reply
options.action: Delete a reply to a review
options.description: Delete a reply to a review

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve details of a specific review on Google Business Profile

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve multiple reviews

options.name: Reply
options.description: Reply to a review

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

location.name: location
location.description: The specific location or business associated with the account
location.ai_hint: The specific location or business associated with the account

postType.name: postType
postType.description: The type of post to create (standard, event, offer, or alert)
postType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

summary.name: summary
summary.description: The main text of the post
summary.ai_hint: The main text of the post

title.name: title
title.description: E.g. 20% off in store or online.
title.ai_hint: E.g. 20% off in store or online.

startDateTime.name: startDateTime
startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the event
startDateTime.ai_hint: The start date and time of the event

endDateTime.name: endDateTime
endDateTime.description: The end date and time of the event
endDateTime.ai_hint: The end date and time of the event

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: The start date of the offer
startDate.ai_hint: The start date of the offer

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: The end date of the offer
endDate.ai_hint: The end date of the offer

alertType.name: alertType

options.name: Covid 19
options.description: This alert is related to the 2019 Coronavirus Disease pandemic

alertType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions

options.name: summary
options.description: The main text of the post

options.name: languageCode
options.description: The language code of the post content. More info.

options.name: callToActionType
options.description: The type of call to action

options.name: Action Type Unspecified
options.description: Type unspecified

options.name: Book
options.description: This post wants a user to book an appointment/table/etc

options.name: Get Offer
options.description: Deprecated. Use OFFER in LocalPostTopicType to create a post with offer content.

options.name: Learn More
options.description: This post wants a user to learn more (at their website)

options.name: Order
options.description: This post wants a user to order something

options.name: Shop
options.description: This post wants a user to browse a product catalog

options.name: Sign Up
options.description: This post wants a user to register/sign up/join something

options.name: url
options.description: The URL that users are sent to when clicking through the promotion

options.name: startDateTime
options.description: The start date and time of the event

options.name: endDateTime
options.description: The end date and time of the event

options.name: title
options.description: E.g. 20% off in store or online.

options.name: startDate
options.description: The start date of the offer

options.name: endDate
options.description: The end date of the offer

options.name: couponCode
options.description: The coupon code for the offer

options.name: redeemOnlineUrl
options.description: Link to redeem the offer

options.name: termsConditions
options.description: The terms and conditions of the offer

additionalOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

post.name: post
post.description: Select the post to retrieve its details

properties.errorMessage: The name must be in the format "accounts/123/locations/123/localPosts/123"

post.ai_hint: Select the post to retrieve its details

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

notice.displayName: Make sure that the updated options are supported by the post type. More info.
notice.name: notice

review.name: review
review.description: Select the review to retrieve its details

properties.errorMessage: The name must not start with "accounts/123/locations/123/reviews/"

review.ai_hint: Select the review to retrieve its details

reply.name: reply
reply.description: The body of the reply (up to 4096 characters)
reply.ai_hint: The body of the reply (up to 4096 characters)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions

values.name: batchSize
values.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchInterval
values.description: Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.

options.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
options.description: Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

options.name: proxy
options.description: HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128

options.name: timeout
options.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request

requestOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'post' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'postType'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'summary'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'EVENT' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'EVENT' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDateTime'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'EVENT' THEN SHOW parameter 'endDateTime'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'OFFER' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'OFFER' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDate'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'OFFER' THEN SHOW parameter 'endDate'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' AND postType == 'ALERT' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertType'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalOptions'
IF /postType IN ["STANDARD", "EVENT", "ALERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'callToActionType'
IF /postType IN ["STANDARD", "EVENT", "ALERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF /postType == 'OFFER' THEN SHOW parameter 'couponCode'
IF /postType == 'OFFER' THEN SHOW parameter 'redeemOnlineUrl'
IF /postType == 'OFFER' THEN SHOW parameter 'termsConditions'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'post'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'post'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'post'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalOptions'
IF resource == 'review' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'review'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'review'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'account'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'review'
IF resource == 'review' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'reply'
